title: Video Object Tracking
description: An end-to-end deep learning pipeline for robust multi-object tracking on the MOT16 dataset—built for self-driving cars, intelligent surveillance, and live sports analytics.
detailedDescription: Video Object Tracking is a state-of-the-art system combining a fine-tuned Faster R-CNN (ResNet-50 FPN) for high-precision person detection with a Siamese network for consistent re-identification through occlusions. On-the-fly color jitter and Gaussian blur augmentations further improve robustness. The full pipeline is demonstrated in an interactive Colab notebook and output tracking video.
features: Fine-tuned Faster R-CNN (ResNet-50 FPN) achieving 87% accuracy, 99% precision, 93% F₁
Siamese network generating 256-D embeddings; contrastive loss ↓ 0.32 → 0.27
On-the-fly color jitter and Gaussian blur for augmentation
Integrated detection + tracking video output
Interactive Colab demo for easy experimentation

title: Personal Finance Tracker
description: A responsive web application to help you track bank accounts, budgets, and expenses—built with React, TypeScript, Vite and Supabase.
detailedDescription: Personal Finance Tracker is a real-time finance management app built with React, TypeScript, Vite, and Supabase. It provides an intuitive dashboard for connecting bank accounts, creating and allocating budgets, logging expenses, and visualizing spending trends—all synced live via Supabase.
features: Sign up, log in, and session management via Supabase Auth
Add, list, edit, and remove multiple bank accounts
Create budgets by category and track allocation progress
Log daily expenses and view spending trends
Real-time data syncing with Supabase (PostgreSQL + Auth)
Mobile-first responsive UI using Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui

title: NoteMate
description: NoteMate is a MERN stack app for secure notes with JWT authentication.
detailedDescription: NoteMate is a secure note-taking application built using the MERN stack, with JWT-based authentication for user security.
features: Secure note storage with authentication
Real-time data syncing using MongoDB
Responsive design using TailwindCSS
Fast, responsive UI with React

title: CommerceNest
description: Developed a full-stack eCommerce application using Vue, Express.js, and MongoDB.
detailedDescription: A full-stack eCommerce platform built with Vue, Express.js, and MongoDB, providing a seamless shopping experience.
features: Product catalog with search and filtering
User authentication and profile management
Shopping cart and checkout process
Order history and tracking

title: Real Time Threat Intelligence
description: Developed a comprehensive full stack application integrating various modules.
detailedDescription: A threat intelligence application integrating multiple security modules, designed to manage and analyze cyber threats in real time.
features: Asset Management for tracking digital assets
Threat Intelligence for real-time monitoring
Vulnerability Risk Assessment and incident response
Crisis Management tools for effective decision-making
